about_the_game:
Nora's a bit forgetful, and her kitchen is a mess! Embark on a delightful hidden object adventure through her charming hand-drawn world as you help her find the missing ingredients for her latest culinary creation.

Features:

  • 9 Unique Locations: Explore Nora's cozy house, her vibrant garden, and the quaint surrounding areas in search of hidden treasures.
  • Hundreds of Items to Find: From elusive spices to misplaced utensils, every scene is packed with cleverly concealed objects.
  • 3 Game Modes: Test your observation skills in Regular mode, challenge yourself with Shadows mode, or brave the mysterious Dark mode.
  • Hand-Drawn Artistry: Immerse yourself in a world of whimsical beauty, brought to life with captivating hand-drawn illustrations.
  • Relaxing & Rewarding: Enjoy a lighthearted soundtrack and the satisfaction of uncovering each hidden item.

Can you help Nora find everything she needs and save the day?

  • Hand-Drawn Artistry: Immerse yourself in a world of whimsical beauty, brought to life with captivating hand-drawn illustrations.

name: Nora: In Search of Hidden Ingredients

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable

short_description: Help Nora find the missing items around her house! Try the regular difficulty mode as well as shadows and dark mode.
